4304950.name: Machine Gun Knight
4304950.description:
Machine Gun Knight is a fast-paced vertical roguelike shooter where reflexes, positioning, and a bit of luck decide your run. Descend through ever-changing dungeons packed with enemies, hazards, and surprise encounters. Every run is different, shifting layouts, changing rewards, and meaningful choices shape your build. Firing downward slows your descent, giving you more control while avoiding enemies and hazards. Use momentum and precision to survive the chaos. Between floors, loot upgrades, visit shops, and take risks for greater rewards. Stack power-ups, adapt on the fly, and push deeper as the challenge steadily escalates.

Death is inevitable, but mastery comes with repetition.
